content.text:
# Draft:Howard A. Levine

Howard Arnold Levine (born March 4, 1932) is a former justice of the New York Court of Appeals, having served from 1993 to 2002. He was appointed by Governor Mario Cuomo.
Born in Troy, New York.
"B.A., Yale University, 1953, and LL.B., Yale University, 1956".
